info.name: Youtube 720p layout
info.description: [Rate and discuss!] Resizes the wide (expanded but not fullscreen) layout to 720p instead of 480p so you can view 720p in full resolution without the need of going fullscreen. Also tweaks the featured-sidebar to fill the newly created whitespace by creating two columns instead of one. I use it myself, so when it breaks will mostly be updated in less than a day.
